mapper.select: select m.id,m.label,m.icon,m.sort,m.url,m.parent_id from menu m left join role_menu rm on m.id = rm.menu_id left join role r on rm.role_id = r.id left join user_role ur on r.id = ur.role_id left join user u on ur.user_id = u.id where u.id = #{userId} order by m.sort

select m.id,m.label,m.icon,m.sort,m.url,m.parent_id,m.create_time,m2.label as parent from menu m left join menu m2 on m.parent_id = m2.id
m.label like (CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{query.label}),'%'))
m.url like (CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{query.url}),'%'))
m.parent_id = #{query.parentId}
order by m.create_time desc
